title: DRAFT MASTER: Interactive legal drafting practice tool with tutorials, wizards, practice, comparison feedback, portfolio, and gamification

requirements.text: Create the core app shell for "DRAFT MASTER" with top-level navigation and routes for: Draft (choose draft type), Learn (structure/anatomy tutorials), Portfolio (saved drafts), Skills (skill scoring dashboard), and Settings. Ensure all user-facing text is in English.

acceptanceCriteria: App has a persistent navigation UI exposing Draft, Learn, Portfolio, Skills, Settings.
Each route renders a distinct page with placeholder-to-functional content as other requirements are implemented.
No user-facing text appears in languages other than English.

acceptanceCriteria: Theme colors are used consistently for backgrounds, buttons, highlights, status badges, and charts.
Heading, body/UI, and editor fonts match the specification (or closest web-safe fallbacks if font loading fails).
Key flows (wizard, editor, compare view, portfolio) are usable on mobile widths without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.text: For each draft type, implement the 4-step workflow: (1) Learn Structure tutorial, (2) Guided Drafting Wizard (Q&A) that generates an editable formatted draft, (3) Free Practice Mode (blank drafting from scenario), (4) Compare & Improve (side-by-side user vs model with detected issues and suggestions) with a refine-and-resubmit loop.

acceptanceCriteria: Within a draft type, user can navigate through Steps 1â€“4 and return to any step without losing progress.

Free Practice Mode provides a blank editor plus scenario prompt and a submit action.

Scores and sub-scores are persisted and reflected in Skills and Portfolio views.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no multi-canister/microservices).
Do not use any external LLM/AI API integrations; feedback must be automated locally (heuristics/checklists/model comparison).
App must be offline-first: drafting, review, portfolio, skills, and gamification must work without network access.
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths (compose them instead).
Do not hardcode any third-party NEXUS API URL; endpoint must be user-configurable if used at all.
nonGoals: Building a real-time collaboration experience (no live cursors or WebSockets).
Implementing full legal accuracy for every jurisdiction; model drafts and checklists are educational templates and can start minimal beyond Legal Notice reference implementation.
Integrating external authentication providers beyond Internet Identity.
Implementing a full .docx export if it requires unsupported tooling; focus on PDF/plain text first, with .docx only if feasible within the frontend-only constraint.

required: Minimalist "DRAFT MASTER" logo in a professional legal office style (draft-master-logo.dim_512x512.png)
